entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , North Perth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:26 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 12:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: 1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: 0.4°C
Wind: SE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
